mapper.select: SELECT GM.USER_ID, GM.GROUP_ID, GC.NAME, GC.INTRODUCTION ,GC.ROOT , TO_CHAR(GC.CREATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATION_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GR_MATCH WHERE GROUP_ID= G.ID) AS COUNT FROM GR_MATCH GM JOIN TBL_GROUP G ON GM.GROUP_ID = G.ID JOIN GR_CREATION GC ON G.CREATION_ID = GC.ID WHERE GM.USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT DISTINCT(MMV.MOMENT_ID), MMV.MOMENT_NAME , MMV.GROUP_ID, MMV.GROUP_NAME , MMV.PHASE_ID , MMV.PHASE , MMV.DATE_NAME, MMV.PLACE_NAME FROM MMVIEW MMV RIGHT JOIN MM_PARTICIPANT MT ON MMV.MOMENT_ID = MT.MOMENT_ID WHERE MT.MEMBER_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM GR_MATCH WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}) AND MT.ID NOT IN (SELECT QITER_ID FROM MM_QUIT) AND MMV.MOMENT_ID NOT IN (SELECT MOMENT_ID FROM MM_NONACTIVE)

SELECT * FROM( SELECT DISTINCT(MMV.MOMENT_ID), MMV.MOMENT_NAME , MMV.GROUP_ID, MMV.GROUP_NAME , MMV.PHASE_ID , MMV.PHASE , MMV.DATE_NAME FROM MMVIEW MMV RIGHT JOIN MM_PARTICIPANT MT ON MMV.MOMENT_ID = MT.MOMENT_ID WHERE MT.MEMBER_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM GR_MATCH WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}) AND MT.ID NOT IN (SELECT QITER_ID FROM MM_QUIT) AND MMV.MOMENT_ID NOT IN (SELECT MOMENT_ID FROM MM_NONACTIVE) AND MMV.PHASE_ID='MH03' AND TO_DATE(MMV.DATE_NAME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= SYSDATE ORDER BY TO_DATE(MMV.DATE_NAME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
